title: Adobe Flash Builder v.4.6 Premium (2011) [Multilanguage + Crack]
description:
Adobe Flash Builder v.4.6 Premium (2011) [Multilanguage + Crack]

English:
--------
Title: Adobe Flash Builder Premium
Version: 4.6
Platform: Windows
Language: Multilingual
Treatment: complete (crack patch)
Size: 1.07 Gb

Adobe Flash Builder - an integrated development environment for creating a platform for rich Internet applications. Using Flash Builder, create applications that use the infrastructure of Adobe Flex, MXML, Adobe Flash Player, Adobe AIR, ActionScript 3.0, Adobe LiveCycle Data Services ES graphics components and Adobe Flex. It also includes tools for testing, debugging and profiling, which is achieved through increased productivity and efficiency. Adobe Flash Builder has a multilingual interface with support for the Russian language.

Add Flash Builder:
- Creating Flex projects with support for Adobe ColdFusion and Adobe LiveCycle Data Services
- Create applications that provide access to remote data
- Write and edit the application source code using editors
- Create functions in ActionScript and MXML code in separate files
- Creating custom components and a simple appeal to it
- Project management applications through a set of functions that provides the basic environment of Eclipse IDE
- Development of applications in various ways with integrated builders
- The execution of applications on the web browser or independent flash player
- Flash Builder Debugging with integrated debugging tools
- Publication of the source code of applications that users and developers
- Create a project library allows you to create a common library of components
- Configure the interface development environment (IDE)

In addition to the standard version of Flash Builder Premium version includes the development of memory and performance profiling and automated testing tools. To view the data sent between the client and service data, using a network monitor. In the test environment to create and modify FlexUnit repeatable tests can be run from scripts directly into Flash Builder or outside the Flash Builder. Building a command-line function allows you to synchronize some of the assembly with the developer builds every night.

List of changes
- The distribution is integrated with Adobe Air to upgrade the version 3.1.0.4880.
- The distribution is integrated with Adobe Community Help update to version 3.5.023.
- For kutsemu ESD-installer version adds a menu similar to the box version. Made in the image of the same menu for the product line of CS4. Attention! This menu is only available in English and Russian languages.
- In the folder there is a crack keygen patch, which allows recording Adobe Flash Builder 4.6 Premium. In addition, there is an alternative method of activation, based on the replacement of the original files patched.

The procedure for the treatment

Instructions on how to activate:

1. Run the patch from the crack (as administrator) and click on review of the hosts.
2. Generate key for Adobe Flash Builder v4.5x.
3. Install the program with the previously generated key.
4. Enjoy the registered version of the product!

An alternative (if the first does not work):

1. Install the trial version of the program.
2. Replace all the original files amtservices.dll, located in the folder where you install the application, the modified files from folder crack, previously backed up the original files.
3. Generate key for Adobe Flash Builder v4.5x.
4. Run the program and the popup window, enter the previously generated key.
5. Enjoy the registered version of the product!

Interface languages
It can be installed with the interface in the following languages: en_US, ja_JP, de_DE, fr_FR, zh_CN, ru_RU, es_ES, ar_AE, en_US, el_GR, fi_FI, he_IL, nb_NO, ro_RO, ko_KR, zh_TW, fr_CA, es_ES, en_US, it_IT , pt_BR, nl_NL, sv_SE, cs_CZ, pl_PL, tr_TR, hu_HU, uk_UA.

System Requirements:
- CPU with at least 2 GHz
- Microsoft Windows XP SP3, Windows Vista Ultimate or Enterprise (32 - or 64-bit version that runs 32-bit mode), Windows Server 2008 (32 bit) or Windows 7 (32 - or 64-bit version that runs as a 32 bits)
- 1 GB RAM (2 GB recommended)
- 1.5 GB of free hard disk space
- Java Virtual Machine (32 bit): IBM JRE 1.6 or Sun JRE 1.6
- 1024x768 screen resolution (1280x800 recommended) video card 16-bit
- DVD-ROM
- Software Eclipse 3.6.1 (for installing the plug-in)
